description: Create basic HTML structure with input form and todo list container
details: Single HTML file with form (input + button) and empty list container. Includes  basic CSS for layout.
steps: Create index.html with DOCTYPE and basic structure
Add input field for todo title
Add 'Add' button next to input
Add empty <ul> container for todo list
Add basic CSS in <style> tag for layout
acceptance: Input field is visible and functional

description: Setup todo data structure and in-memory storage
details: Define todo object schema (id, title, completed) and array to hold todos in  JavaScript
steps: Add <script> tag in HTML
Create empty todos array to store todo objects
Define todo object structure: {id, title, completed}
Add ID generation function (e.g., Date.now())
acceptance: Todos array is declared and accessible
Todo object schema is documented in code comment

details: Handle form submission, create todo object, add to array, render in list (AC:  Users can add new todo items with a title)
steps: Add event listener to 'Add' button
Get title value from input field
Validate title is not empty
Create new todo object with id, title, completed: false
Push todo to todos array
Clear input field
Call renderTodos() to update UI
acceptance: Clicking Add button creates new todo
Empty title shows alert or is blocked

description: Implement renderTodos function to display todo list
details: Dynamically generate <li> elements for each todo with click handler for  completion toggle
steps: Create renderTodos() function
Clear existing list items in <ul>
Loop through todos array
For each todo, create <li> with title text
Add click event listener to each <li> for toggling complete
Append <li> to <ul> container
acceptance: All todos in array are displayed
List updates when renderTodos() is called
List shows in correct order (newest first or by ID)

description: Implement mark complete functionality with toggle
details: Click todo to toggle completed status in data array (AC: Users can mark todos as   complete)
steps: In <li> click handler, find todo by ID in todos array
Toggle the completed property (true/false)
Call renderTodos() to refresh UI
acceptance: Clicking a todo toggles its completed state
Todo can be marked complete and then incomplete

description: Add strikethrough styling for completed todos
details: Apply CSS class or inline style to show completed todos with strikethrough (AC:  Completed todos show with strikethrough)
steps: In renderTodos(), check if todo.completed is true
If completed, add CSS class 'completed' to <li>
Define .completed CSS rule with text-decoration: line-through
Optionally add color change (e.g., gray text)

description: Manual testing of all user flows
details: Test add todo flow, mark complete flow, and visual strikethrough
steps: Test: Add multiple todos with different titles
Test: Add todo with empty title (should be blocked)
Test: Click todo to mark complete
Test: Click completed todo to mark incomplete
Test: Verify strikethrough appears/disappears
Test: Verify input clears after adding
acceptance: UI updates are immediate and correct
Edge cases handled (empty input, rapid clicks)
